p: All AEs observed in the study were grade 1 or 2, except for 3 grade 3 AEs. These were abdominal pain on day 8 in the baloxavir group, and severe vitamin D deficiency at baseline (undiagnosed preexisting conditions, determined by raised alkaline phosphatase levels on day 1) in 2 children in the oseltamivir group. There were no clinically meaningful changes from baseline in any laboratory parameters or vital signs.
